title: Fuel expenses
content: Hey y'all, Would it be useful if there was an app that helps commuters connect with commuters, eg lets say I travel from Marathahalli To PES daily and my fuel expenses accounts to almost 200 everyday. And there is a guy who'd like to tag along with me for fuel sharing. Would this app be useful for people whose fuel expenses break their bank balances? Thank you

comments.body: Wdym tag along for fuel sharing?
No like in general, an app for commuters
There is an app called Quickride for that purpose.
Wasnt it banned by govt? Like carpooling was banned right?
Male more friends bruh ask if someone goes that way
Idk if I want to male my friends, they are already male enough.

Makes sense actually 
It would considerably decrease the fuel expenses.
